title: Bad Company
description: The first volume in the Lifer series.A lifer sentenced to 622 years. And the best years of his life too! What could be worse than that? It's Montechristo! In the darkest hours he is there, ready to remind you of everything you are trying to forget. He holds all the aces in the game of sarcasm... and has another one up his sleeve.
author: Arkas
